desc.message: Remove everything from the new tab page and display any image, gif or video in it as a wallpaper.

error_alert_2.message: Please try to refresh the page.

change_background_settings_alert.message: To change a background's settings select it by left-clicking on it.

set_last_uploaded_label_text.message: Automatically set the last uploaded background as current

allow_analytics_label_text.message: Allow Clear New Tab to send anonymous usage information

show_link_to_default_new_tab_label_text.message: Show a link to default new tab page in new tab

show_bookmarks_bar_label_text.message: Show bookmarks bar in new tab

allow_downloading_imgs_by_link_label_tex.message: Allow downloading images by a link

option_stretch_browser_text.message: Stretch to fit the browser window

install_help_text_chrome.message: Thanks for installing Clear New Tab! If your Chrome have theme from Chrome Web Store installed, wait till its background appear in an "Backgrounds" section, and then open new tab to see it. Otherwise, you can upload your own background with the form below. Click to hide this message.

install_help_text_firefox.message: Thanks for installing Clear New Tab! You can install theme from Chrome Web Store or upload your own background with the form below. Click to hide this message.

install_help_text_edge.message: Thanks for installing Clear New Tab! If your Edge have a theme installed, wait till its background appears in the "Backgrounds" section, and then open new tab to see it. Otherwise, you can upload your own background with the form below. Click <button type='button' class='link install_help_link hide_install_help_link'>here</button> to hide this message.

upload_box_help_message_text.message:
You can upload multiple images / videos at once. Just select multiple images / videos before clicking "Open" / dragging.

Supported formats: png, jpg, gif, mp4, webm, ogg.

paste_help_message_text.message:
In this input you can paste direct link to an image or an image from clipboard. To get direct link to an image right-click on it, select "Open image in new tab" from the context menu, go to opened tab and then copy link from address bar. To copy an image to clipboard right-click on an it and then select "Copy image" from the context menu. Gif animation will not be preserved when you past an image from clipboard.

Supported formats: png, jpg, gif.

mode_help_message_text.message:
Theme background: when this mode is selected, backgrounds of themes that you install in the Chrome Web Store will be automatically downloaded and appear in a new tab. In this mode, you do not need to upload your own backgrounds. If you uploaded your own backgrounds, use the "One background" or "Multiple backgrounds" mode.

One background: when this mode is selected, a new tab will show you a background you selected using the "Set selected" button. Use this mode if you have uploaded your own backgrounds and want to see one of them in a new tab.

Multiple backgrounds: when this mode is selected, a new tab will show one of the backgrounds you uploaded, changing it at a given interval. Use this mode if you want to see all backgrounds you uploaded.

Random solid color: when this mode is selected, a new tab will show a randomly chosen color, changing it at a given interval.

settings_type_help_message_text.message: Select "Global" to set the default settings for all backgrounds. Select "Only selected background" to set the settings for the selected background only (to select a background, left-click on it). When "Only selected background" is selected, each setting below ("Background color", "Background size" etc.) will have its own "Global" value. If this value is selected, the background will use the default value for this setting, if any other value is selected, this setting will use this value instead of the default value. All uploaded backgrounds use global settings by default.

size_help_message_text.message:
Fit to the screen / browser window:
Resize the background to make sure the background is fully visible on screen / browser window.

Cover the screen / browser window:
Resize the background to cover the entire screen / browser window, even if it has to cut a part of it from the edges.

Stretch to fit the screen / browser window:
Resize the background to maximum screen / browser window width and height not preserving its aspect ratio.

premium_purchasing_state_not_licensed_te.message: You are not a premium user.

premium_purchasing_state_error_text.message: An error occured while Fetching your premium license info. Check your internet connection and log in in your Google account.

inapp_notice_text_text.message: This feature is available in Clear New Tab Premium.

purchase_error_alert.message: An error occurred while processing your purchase.

help_translating_link_text.message: 🈯 Help translating Clear New Tab into the language you know

chrome_theme_creator_packages_link_text.message: 🛠️ Create your own theme with the Chrome Theme Creator app (Windows 7, macOS, Linux)

rate_link_text.message: ⭐️ Rate this extension if you like it

donate_link_text.message: 💖 Support the development of this extension by donating any amount via PayPal

analytics_privacy_message_text.message: Do you want to allow Clear New Tab to send anonymous usage information to Google Analytics for product improvement purposes?

premium_desc_text.message: Here you can purchase Clear New Tab Premium. Clear New Tab Premium license is tied to your Google account (so make sure you are logged in in the account you usually use), lasts forever and will not be lost after Clear New Tab reinstallation. You can try out all the Clear New Tab Premium features for free in the Clear New Tab for Firefox.

inapp_theme_beta_feature_desc_text.message: Automatically downloads a theme background when you install a theme from ThemeBeta in "Theme background" mode.

inapp_random_solid_color_feature_desc_te.message: Shows randomly chosen solid colors in new tabs.

inapp_slideshow_feature_desc_text.message: Changes backgrounds in the same new tab at a given interval.

inapp_slide_feature_desc_text.message: Changes backgrounds with slide effect when "Slideshow" checkbox is checked.

inapp_paste_btn_feature_desc_text.message: Adds a paste button to the "Paste image or URL" input.

link_to_default_new_tab_tooltip.message: Go to default new tab page

theme_installiation_error_alert.message: An error occurred when installing a theme. Most likely because this theme is paid.

wrong_mode_alert.message: An error occured. Before installing themes from Chrome Web Store you need to select "Theme background" mode in options page.

msg_to_user_text.message:
Important message for Clear New Tab users!

Since Google deprecated Chrome Web Store payments I will not be able to sell premium version of Clear New Tab soon, so I made it free for everyone. In the future I will may monetize it again with other payment processing platform. If possible, I will refund money to everyone who purchased Clear New Tab Premium in the past, so you don't pay twice. Click on this message to hide it.
